item.title: Searchable Fragments with the Paging Library
item.author: Author
item.description: This post is inspired by @EpicPandaForceÂ answer in StackOverflow. I faced the same problem which I didn’t know how to solve: How to perform search when you are using a Paging Library (or how the hell to refresh after I reperform Rooms query)? Let’s suppose we have this scenario: I have a list of data, which are shown in the Fragment by LiveData observation, which are retrieved by the ViewModel through LiveDataPagedListBuilder().
